name: Inkletint Island
description:
Made in 11 hours for GMC Jam 36 where the theme was "Everything has a cost".

Since Professor P. Podley accidentally lost Inkletint Island's Sacred Fruits, the islanders don't want to talk to him anymore. Horrendous traps have started appearing and Podley is too old to go exploring the whole island himself.

The solution? He creates an ink blot to do the work for him! Unfortunately, moving around depletes your health. Explore the whole island gaining HP by collecting the sacred fruits.

Music made by teammate Allison James.
